remarks: Value of the structure replacement function, deduction version. (Contributed by AV, 14-Mar-2020.)
statement:
setsidvald.e $e |- E = Slot N $.
setsidvald.n $e |- N e. NN $.
setsidvald.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
setsidvald.f $e |- ( ph -> Fun S ) $.
setsidvald.d $e |- ( ph -> ( E ` ndx ) e. dom S ) $.
setsidvald $p |- ( ph -> S = ( S sSet <. ( E ` ndx ) , ( E ` S ) >. ) ) $.
